tasks.name: Compost
tasks.description: Reduce landfill waste by properly composting scraps into valuable nutrients for your garden!

tasks.name: Enjoy the Sun
tasks.description: Save energy by going outside. Don't forget sunscreen!

tasks.name: Support Native Species
tasks.description: Plant native plants and prevent invasive species from overpopulating!

tasks.name: Donate to Park
tasks.description: Donating to conservation parks help them and their efforts to conserve native habitats and encourage education

tasks.name: Visit Conservation Park
tasks.description: Learn more about what the parks do and how you can be involved in their conservation efforts!

tasks.name: Support Community
tasks.description: Be involved with your community by caring for a garden together!
